name: DCI DANFORTH AND THE SEAL OF THE REALM
name_original: DCI DANFORTH AND THE SEAL OF THE REALM
description:
SEAL OF THE REALM is an off-beat Point & Click Detective Adventure Story

DCI Dan Danforth is sent by his boss Commissioner Keith Barnham to Investigate the Robbery of the priceless artifact SEAL OF THE REALM
once owned by Julius Caesar at the National Museum.

Join DCI Danforth as he looks for clues to the robbery at Brocodale House, 
and interacts with a cast of unlikely characters to solve this shocking crime.

Windows  - 7/8/10      Min Operating System   i5  - 2.2 Ghz  -  NVIDIA GTX  560M 

SINGLE PLAYER
